sentences.sContent: It is natural for the shopkeeper to feel annoyed when the hypermarket is set up close to his shop.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is natural for the shopkeeper to feel annoyed when the hypermarket is set up close to his shop.
sentences.sCn: 当特大超级市场挨着这家商场建立起来时，店主感到苦恼是正常的。

sentences.sContent: Once the rubble is cleared away, the planis to turn the site into a commercial complex, with an indoor theme park, hugefive-star hotel, hypermarket, and office block.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once the rubble is cleared away, the planis to turn the site into a commercial complex, with an indoor theme park, hugefive-star hotel, hypermarket, and office block.
sentences.sCn: 拆掉后，计划是将这个地块变成商业综合体，里面将设立室内主题公园，巨型五星级酒店，大型超市以及办公大楼。

remMethod.val: hyper(超过) + market(市场) → 超过一般市场的 → 特大超市

trans.tranCn: 特大超市， 超大型自助商场
